# Introduction

Welcome to class! These web-pages contain all the information you need to accomplish your class work for  **Animal-Tracking nella Biologia della Conservazione** (2023-2024).

# General information

This is an discretionary course for master level students enrolled in the "Biologia Ambientale" degree at the University of Rome Tor Vergata. It is worth **2 CFU** for a total of 16 hours (i.e., 8 classes of 2 hours each) to be administered in person or remotely.
